import React from "react"; import { useGetMeQuery } from "../../redux/api/userApi"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLazyLogoutQuery } from "../../redux/api/authApi"; const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { isLoading } = useGetMeQuery(); const [logout] = useLazyLogoutQuery(); const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); const logoutHandler = async () => { try { await logout().unwrap(); // call your API (if any) } catch (err) { console.error("Logout API error:", err); } // Clear Redux state dispatch(clearUser()); // Show message toast.success("Logged out successfully"); // Redirect to login page navigate("/admin/login"); }; // const logoutHandler = () => { // logout(); // navigate(0); // }; return (
{/* */}

    • ) : ( !isLoading && ( LOGIN ) )}
{/* */}
); }; export default Header;
